title: Kona Grill offers state-specific privacy notice for certain US states
statement: Residents of California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Iowa, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, Oregon, Texas, Utah, and Virginia have additional privacy rights detailed in a state-specific privacy notice.

citations.quote: Residents of California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Iowa, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, Oregon, Texas, Utah, and Virginia have certain additional privacy rights
